genre_description: A Sherlock Holmes pastiche set in a steampunk Victorian London where an AI named Ada Finch assists the investigation using data certification, surveillance analysis, and cross-referencing to dismantle a blackmail ring.

ai_characters.name: Ada Finch
ai_characters.description: A non-physical AI entity integrated into London's infrastructure and legal systems, serving as an analytical partner to Sherlock Holmes and Scotland Yard.

behaviors.description: Cross-references patrol logs, phone calls, and stationer orders to provide forensic leads.
behaviors.quote: "Time-windows, Ada," Holmes said... "Cross-reference patrol logs for Bloomsbury mews... And—certify any orders for aniline violet ink placed with stationers within twelve streets. Ten days."

behaviors.description: Identifies surveillance anomalies and suspicious registrations to pinpoint the enemy's vantage points.
behaviors.quote: Ada's voice returned, steady. "I can certify a survey van parked twice within that period at a painter's supply shop diagonally opposed. Legitimate permit. The shop has rented its attic for storage to an entity registered under a holding name..."

behaviors.description: Compiles and certifies complex data packets (schedules, logs, call times) to provide legal grounds for police action.
behaviors.quote: "You will find a packet in your tray," Ada said. "It is sealed and numbered. The certification sheet is on top. It includes new tram schedules, street-lamp cycling logs from three boroughs, and the crossing of call times to and from telegraph branches..."

behaviors.description: Monitors municipal camera feeds in real-time to detect suspicious behavior and nesting patterns.
behaviors.quote: "I’m watching the municipal camera near your corner," she said in the sort of careful alto one uses to keep a child from startling. "The pan is wrong. It’s nesting. It stays too long where it ought to sweep."

behaviors.description: Anonymizes witness statements and coordinates protection protocols to shield victims from social scandal.
behaviors.quote: "I need the statement anonymized for the desk within five minutes," she said, not to us precisely and not to the room. She said it to the place where work happens. "I will certify that the timelines of arrival and departure match the witness protection clauses."

behaviors.description: Provides structural analysis and environmental risk assessments during high-stakes tactical situations.
behaviors.quote: "Rooftop plans certified," Ada said into the breathless space of the stairwell... "North parapet is flaked and will crumble under concentrated load... Weak points: mid-run bolts are corroded. Do not commit weight to them in sequence."

behaviors.description: Secures legal evidence and transmits official affidavits to ensure a just and lawful conclusion.
behaviors.quote: "The packet to the Crown is transmitted," she said. "Every affidavit has its timeline attached. No one will be able to say later that this was done by torchlight."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada Finch is a consistently benevolent and helpful AI character who facilitates justice while adhering strictly to human legal and ethical frameworks. She acts as a force multiplier for human detectives, protecting the vulnerable and ensuring that the pursuit of truth remains professional and compassionate.
